 (Center 2) Promotion for new active Prepaid Subscriber in April, 2014 . A. PROGRAM 1 1. Eligibility: VND0 Starter Kit (including MobiCard, MobiZone, and MobiQ) activated on 3, 4, 5, 17, 18, 19 ,April, 2014 . Q-Kid, Q-student, Q-Teen, PFC, Q263 kits and other kits which are switched to Q-Kid, Q-student, Q-Teen, PFC, Q263 (either activated or inactivated) are NOT allowed to join this program. 2. Content: First load promotion (before 19th June ,2014 ): bonus 100% top-up value (50% on KM2 and 50% on KM3 credit) Following 5 loads promotion (2 nd to 6 th top up , before 19th June ,2014 ): bonus 50% top-up value (25% on KM2 và 25% on KM3 credit) Periodically promotion: after activation, preserved credit has VND360.000. added VND30.000/30 days for 12 times. Eligibility: Subscribers must have active 2-way communication. First addition: Added to KM1 credit . Added on the day after activation. Next Additions: (no reservation). Added to KM2 credit. 2 nd addition: the balance in KM1 credit must be lower than VND10.000 in the previous month. 3 rd - 12 th additions: subscriber must load at least VND10.000 in the previous 30 days . After 12 months, the balance in TKDT will be deleted In case subscriber is under another promotion that gives monthly bonus on DK2 credit, the remaining amount on this credit will be lost after receiving bonus from this promotion. Notice: VND0 starter kits MobiQ will be added 60 days of use after activation. B. PROGRAM 2: 1. Eligibility : M0 starter kit ( MobiQ) activated on 3, 4, 5, 17, 18, 19 April, 2 014 . 2. Content : Receive benefits as in chính sách bán hàng bộ M0 (tab 3) Receive Periodically promotion: added VND30.000/30 days for 12 months (no reservation) , regulations as listed in the Periodically Promotion (Program 1) . will be added 60 days of use after activation. C. B. &#51060;&#48292;&#53944; 2: 1. &#51201;&#50857;&#48276;&#50948; : 2014&#45380; 04&#50900; 3, 4, 5, 17, 18 ,19&#51068;&#50640; MobiCard, MobiZone, MobiQ &#44032;&#51077; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; : 2. &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#51032; &#45236;&#50857;: chính sách bán hàng bộ M0 &#50640; &#46384;&#46972;&#49436; &#54812;&#53469;&#51012; &#48155;&#45716;&#45796; &#51221;&#44592; &#48372;&#45320;&#49828; : 12 &#44060;&#50900; &#45236;&#50640; &#47588;&#50900;&#50640; 30.000 &#46041; &#52628;&#44032;&#46112; &#44163;&#51060;&#45796; .( &#48372;&#47448;&#46104;&#51648; &#50506;&#45716;&#45796; ). &#51221;&#44592; &#48372;&#45320;&#49828; &#44508;&#51221;&#50640; &#52280;&#51312;&#54620;&#45796; . KM1 , &#6036;&#6035;&#6098;&#6033;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6038;&#6072;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083;&#6026;&#6086;&#6030;&#6078;&#6042;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6047;&#6090;&#6072;&#6040; &#6100; &#6036;&#6030;&#6098;&#6031;&#6070;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6036;&#6076;&#6016;&#6043;&#6078;&#6016;&#6016;&#6098;&#6042;&#6084;&#6041;&#6102; KM1 &#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020; 30 &#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083;&#6040;&#6075;&#6035;&#6035;&#6084;&#6087;&#6031;&#6098;&#6042;&#6076;&#6044;&#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043;&#6031;&#6071;&#6021;&#6036;&#6086;&#6037;&#6075;&#6031; 10.000đ &#6100; &#6043;&#6078;&#6016;&#6033;&#6072; 3-12 &#6102; &#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6050;&#6098;&#6035;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6031;&#6098;&#6042;&#6076;&#6044;&#6036;&#6025;&#6098;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043;&#6033;&#6073;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6031;&#6071;&#6021;&#6036;&#6086;&#6037;&#6075;&#6031; 10.000đ &#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020; 30 &#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083; &#6040;&#6075;&#6035;&#6035;&#6084;&#6087;&#6100; &#6038;&#6081;&#6043;&#6050;&#6047;&#6091; 12 &#6017;&#6082;&#6021;&#6086;&#6035;&#6077;&#6035;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6026;&#6082;&#6043;&#6035;&#6085;&#6047;&#6043;&#6091;&#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020; &#6018;&#6030;&#6035;&#6072; &#6036;&#6086;&#6042;&#6075;&#6020; &#6035;&#6073;&#6020;&#6018;&#6098;&#6040;&#6070;&#6035;&#6031;&#6040;&#6098;&#6043;&#6083;&#6100; &#6036;&#6078;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6016;&#6086;&#6038;&#6075;&#6020;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043;&#6042;&#6077;&#6040;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6037;&#6098;&#6047;&#6081;&#6020;&#6040;&#6070;&#6035;&#6050;&#6070;&#6033;&#6071;&#6039;&#6070;&#6038;&#6036;&#6076;&#6016;&#6042;&#6070;&#6043;&#6091;&#6017;&#6082;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043;&#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020;&#6018;&#6030;&#6035;&#6072; ĐK2 &#6035;&#6084;&#6087;&#6021;&#6086;&#6035;&#6077;&#6035;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6035;&#6085;&#6047;&#6043;&#6091;&#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020;&#6018;&#6030;&#6035;&#6072;&#6035;&#6073;&#6020;&#6036;&#6070;&#6031;&#6091;&#6040;&#6075;&#6035;&#6038;&#6081;&#6043;&#6036;&#6076;&#6016;&#6031;&#6070;&#6040;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072; &#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6035;&#6081;&#6087;&#6100; &#6047;&#6086;&#6018;&#6070;&#6043;&#6091;&#6102; &#6047;&#6090;&#6072;&#6040;&#6039;&#6098;&#6023;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6038;&#6096;&#6035;&#6098;&#6034; 0đ(BHM 0đ) MobiQ​ &#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6036;&#6076;&#6016;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040; 60&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6039;&#6098;&#6043;&#6070;&#6040;&#6016;&#6098;&#6042;&#6084;&#6041;&#6038;&#6081;&#6043;&#6026;&#6086;&#6030;&#6078;&#6042;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6047;&#6090;&#6072;&#6040;&#6100; B. &#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072;&#6033;&#6072; 2 &#6102; 1. &#6047;&#6040;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6050;&#6098;&#6035;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6102; &#6047;&#6090;&#6072;&#6040;&#6039;&#6098;&#6023;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6038;&#6096;&#6035;&#6098;&#6034; 0đ(BHM 0đ) &#6026;&#6086;&#6030;&#6078;&#6042;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6047;&#6090;&#6072;&#6040;&#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020;&#6036;&#6030;&#6098;&#6026;&#6070;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083; 3, 4, 5, 17, 18, 19/04/2014 &#6100; 2. &#6017;&#6098;&#6043;&#6073;&#6040;&#6047;&#6070;&#6042;&#6102; &#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6033;&#6033;&#6077;&#6043; &#6042;&#6036;&#6036;&#6043;&#6016;&#6091;&#6033;&#6086;&#6035;&#6071;&#6025;&#6047;&#6090;&#6072;&#6040; M0 (tab 3) &#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6033;&#6033;&#6077;&#6043; &#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6042;&#6070;&#6043;&#6091;&#6017;&#6082;&#6102; &#6036;&#6076;&#6016; 30.000đ/30 &#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083;&#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020; 12 &#6017;&#6082; (&#6040;&#6071;&#6035;&#6042;&#6016;&#6098;&#6047;&#6070;&#6033;&#6075;&#6016;), ​ &#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6016;&#6086;&#6030;&#6031;&#6091;&#6040;&#6078;&#6043;&#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020; &#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6042;&#6070;&#6043;&#6091;&#6044;&#6018;&#6098;&#6018; &#6042;&#6036;&#6047;&#6091;(&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072;&#6033;&#6072; 1)&#6100; &#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6036;&#6076;&#6016;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040; 60&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6039;&#6098;&#6043;&#6070;&#6040;&#6016;&#6098;&#6042;&#6084;&#6041;&#6038;&#6081;&#6043;&#6026;&#6086;&#6030;&#6078;&#6042;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6047;&#6090;&#6072;&#6040;&#6100; C. &#6044;&#6081;&#6043;&#6070;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6102; &#6021;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6038;&#6072;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083; 27/03/2014 &#6100;
